data.value: This is the page which is opened clicking the name of the author of each post. There must be a Profile widget on this page.

data.name: PageForThreadsDetailedDescription
data.value: This is the page which is opened clicking the name of a forum. There must be a Forum widget on this page set to display Threads or Threads and Posts or Full forum funcionality.
data.comment: Phrase: This is the page which is opened clicking the name of a forum. There must be a Forum widget on this page set to display Threads or Threads and Posts or Full forum funcionality.

data.comment: Phrase: Page for Posts of each thread

data.comment: Phrase: This is the page which is opened clicking the name of a thread. There must be a Forum widget on this page set to display Post of one thread only or Threads and Posts or Full forum functionallity.
